typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Harvest_Unit as string,
		Operation_Type_Code as string,
		Product_Code as string,
		Species_Code as string,
		Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_Harvested_GMT as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_Harvest_Commencement as date,
		Actual_Date_of_Reconciliation as date,
		Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_Harvested_GMT as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_SE_Cartage as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_SE_Harvesting as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_SE_Other as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_SE_Cartage as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_SE_Harvesting as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_SE_Other as decimal(19,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceReadyLoad
SourceReadyLoad select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Operation_Type_Code,
		Area_Treated,
		Treatment_Cost,
		Unit_Cost,
		Budget_Area_Treated,
		Budget_Treatment_Cost,
		Budget_Unit_Cost,
		Last_Age_Class_Date,
		Species_Survived,
		Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MapColumns
MapColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Operation_Type_Code,
		Area_Treated,
		Treatment_Cost,
		Unit_Cost,
		Budget_Area_Treated,
		Budget_Treatment_Cost,
		Budget_Unit_Cost,
		Last_Age_Class_Date,
		Species_Survived,
		Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetRelational
